Just like the commenter below me said, it's better for Childhood Friend to find a new wife, and even if they accidentally meet again in the future where this bitch are raising kittens while her "uncle" is dead, the childhood friend will choose his wife more than her tragic first love. That's better in my view than being back with the bitch.

You could say he narrates it was the last time he saw her again in his life! Cementing the end of his youth by realizing he got off better and dodged a bullet! And she, well, I'm sure raising his "kittens" alone and finally coming to terms that what he did was evil and monstrous and she was a fool for playing along with it, owing him or not (especially when he admitted he had REASONS for adopting her which was NOT in her best interest, but his perverted attempt to use her as a "Second chance" to get with her mom via her! Meaning he was never seeing HER, just her mother And once she realizes that, that will really break her spirit! It means "Uncle" never loved her, not truly! Every time they did it, he was thinking of her mother and used the "Cat" crap to hide and justify!) But hey, it was better for her CF! She was the indecisive one who couldn't just tell him not interested and kept his hopes up! So frankly she'll have to accept her "getting away" was for the best for HIM! and Move on

Plus let's be real! After this, she suddenly got transfered out and they moved away once his alpha male "She's mine" finally cooled down and he realized he put himself and his "Relationship" at risk by letting the CF know! And the CF never sees her again! I imagine years later when CF finally got over her and married another, they come across each other by sheer accident! It's awkward like it was when they were young and with that in mind! And they talk! Turns out the scumbag died a few years into the "marriage (Frankly I set it where their 30 now!) she's had to raise the two kids she had with him alone! The money he left behind long run out and frankly without being cock crazy, finally got to realizing how fucked up it all was and how she fucked up and tries to see if they could hook up! Only for him to show he was married and she walks away downcasted, feeling idiotic for assuming he would have waited for her after the last time they met!

Of course she could have told him she wasn't interested....but that would have taken the thunder out of the "NTR!" And of course her pathetic attempt to keep that friendship with the awkwardness was made useless cause he decided to let him find out! (Knowing the logic, he was likely expecting his LOVE for her to keep him quiet as not only would she be homeless when he gets arrested but she would be HUMILATED as well!) 

My guess is since others said this has a omake! History repeats itself. Fate (or otherwise) kills them both off leaving the girl an Orphean, and the LOSER CF "adopts her" just to "wife Husbandry" her like what happened to her mother (Just like the creep-o did as he did say her mother rejected him, making it clear he and the Unlucky CF have something in common!)
This is some good stuff alright. 👍
